pethsamkaru (udaya gammanpila) prakashakara sitinne ihatha ki warshika maha ruswimen anathuruwa dijital nominis simasahitha samagama wisin pethsamkaru (udaya gammanpila) sathuwa pawathi atarni balapathrayen miladi gath kotas miliyana 2,100,000 warsha 1997.12.04 wana dina wanik inkopareshan limitang samagamata wikuna labagath mudalin 6 wana wagauththarakaru (sidni jayasinha) pan eeshiya bankuwe kotas miladi ganimata labagath mulya pahasukamwalin (naya) kotasak samathayata path karana lada bawaya. ee. pethsamkaru (udaya gammanpila) thawaduratath prakashakara sitinne 6 wana wagauththarakaruge aramudal yoda ohuge (sidni jayasinhage) atarni balapathraya magin dijital nominis samagamata miladi gath kotas 2,000,000k pethsamkaruge (udaya gammanpilage) atarni balapathraya bhawitha kara 2000.07.24 wana dina dhammika perera mahatha hata wikinu bawayi. bi. pethsamkaru prakasha kara sitinne ihatha ki kotas wikinimen labagath mudal 6 wana wagauththara karuta(sidni jayasinhata) labadun bawayi."

man dannawa.mage aadaraniya sahrudaya - oba biya naththek bawa.eeth obe jiwithe eka mohothak mata denna.mama obawa genayannam ethanata .mulinma menna me sudupata mal pokura ganna .hondayi..........eeka ee widihatama oya papuwata thada karaganna .watenma miduma galanawa thamayi .eeth ee papuwe gasma wadiwenna idadenna epa.mama aayemath oben ayadinawa .dan api inne dawalata monatharam janakirna wunath madhyama rathriya weddi balu ballekwath enna kamathi nathi ee sundara susanaye batahira dwaraya issaraha.pitipassa harila baluwoth 'bani remand' awamangalya adhyakshawaru penewi .eeth danmama issaraha balanna epa.oba biya wewi.kochchara nirbhitha wunath oba biya wewi.pudumayak naha.awurudu namayak thisse ude hawasa me thana dakkath , ra weddi me susanaya diha balanna mama thamath bayayi.mama obata wada durwalayi .ee kathawa ahanna anduru susanayata obath ekka mama aawe ......oba mata wada baya nathi hindayi .hondayi......watetama andhakaraya.gettuwagawa murakutiye pahan eliya yanthamata penawa.wam atha paththe, kohehari palliyaka bauthismaya labapu aya nidanawa.matha ekkama enna ;sadda nokara;ee aya samadanayen sathapi inna udawiya !dan api inne hariyatama kanaththa madde.ow.....oya mal pokura ohoma thiyanna.eliya nam madi thamayi .eeth mama me itipandama smarakaya pamula hitawannam .ayi oya bayawela?..........aththada?.............ow...me sohonkothe upatha satahan karala thibunath , wipatha satahan karala naha thamayi.kawuda danne...eya marunath thamath jiwath wenawada kiyala!!!hondayi mama kiyannam eyage kathawa .habayi mage aadaraniya sahrudaya poronduwenna...oba baya wenne naha kiyala........................awurudu pahalowakata kalin wunath kurunduwaththe thattu thune gewal wirala wune naha.gewalwalata wada eewata mandira kiyala kiyana eka sadharanayi.
ee olgage katahanda. . . .

amarikanu jathika ithihasa kauthukagaraye (smithsoniyan kauthukagaraye) paryeshakayan pirisak thamayi, me apuru soya ganima kara aththe. 1885 di iti thatiyakata nanganu labu me katahanda mathukara gena aththe ee smithsoniyan kauthukagarayata kisiwaku wisin parithyaga kara gabada kara thibu parani thati athara thibilayi.

hits wadiwima pitupasa thibena kathawa meyayi.janatha wimukthi peramune samajikayo antharjalaye kandayam washayen yam yam kriyakarakam karana bawa apa danimu.me aya rakiyawa lesama blog balamin bukiye paya 24ma sarisaramin sitithi.esema pudgalikawa danna hadunana kandayam ano lesin sitithi.koment walin bahutharaya admin wisinma damana eewayi.thama mathayata erehi yamak kawuru ho ki wigasa danden paharalath nayin lesa dashta karathi.apa nam eewata biya natha.mema blog eke mama kalayak koment damme natha.eheth ma yayi sitha adminwaraya ano kament magin anek ayata ohuge supurudu praharaya ella karanawa mama dutuwemi.adminwarayata kiya sitinne ohuge blog kadamalle dawasa gewimata apata nohaki bawayi.ohu ese sitha sitinawa wiya haka.apa wagakim sahitha rajakari karana ayayi.blog liwima apage pradhana aadayam margaya nowe.min pasu mema blog eka kiyawimata ma no ena athara kisima koment ekak damanneda natha.min pasu admin ge mathayanta erehiwa damana kisima koment ekakata mage wagakimak natha.nikarune mata awalada nagimen walakina lesa adminwarayata prakashakarami.
